resources.string: When viewing an AMP page (e.g., in Chrome), use Share action and select this app to open that page without AMP (using the default browser, not necessarily the same browser).

This works best on a page that Google has converted to AMP on the fly from a non-AMP source (e.g., mobile.nytimes.com). Hosted AMP pages (e.g., amp.usatoday.com) cannot be directly converted to equivalent non-AMP pages.
What\'s New: Test button to open AMP page for testing.

Support: For questions, suggestions or problems, use the Help button below. If needed, you can open an Issue, give us details (URL, browser, Android version, device) and we will do our best to fix it!
Privacy: No personal or browsing data is collected or shared, except for opening a non-AMP page when you request it.
Disclaimers: Use at your own risk.\nNot affiliated with or endorsed by Google.
